title.raw: 《衛康叔世家》 House of Wei Kang Shu

sentences.zh: 衛康叔名封，周武王同母少弟也。

translations.text: Wei Kang Shu name Feng, Zhou Wu Wang same mother younger brother.

sentences.zh: 其次尚有冉季，冉季最少。

translations.text: His next still has Ran Ji, Ran Ji most young.
Wei Kang Shu name Feng, Zhou Wu Wang same mother younger brother. His next still has Ran Ji, Ran Ji most young.

sentences.zh: 武王已克殷紂，復以殷餘民封紂子武庚祿父，比諸侯，以奉其先祀勿絕。

translations.text: Wu Wang already conquered Yin Zhou, again with Yin remaining people enfeoffed Zhou son Wu Geng Lu Fu, compared to feudal lords, to serve their previous sacrifices not cut off.

sentences.zh: 為武庚未集，恐其有賊心，武王乃令其弟管叔、蔡叔傅相武庚祿父，以和其民。

translations.text: For Wu Geng not gathered, feared his have traitor heart, Wu Wang then ordered his younger brother Guan Shu, Cai Shu teach mutually Wu Geng Lu Fu, to harmonize their people.

sentences.zh: 武王既崩，成王少。

translations.text: Wu Wang already collapsed, Cheng Wang young.

sentences.zh: 周公旦代成王治，當國。

translations.text: Zhou Gong Dan replaced Cheng Wang govern, held country.

sentences.zh: 管叔、蔡叔疑周公，乃與武庚祿父作亂，欲攻成周。

translations.text: Guan Shu, Cai Shu doubted Zhou Gong, then with Wu Geng Lu Fu made disorder, wished attack Cheng Zhou.

sentences.zh: 周公旦以成王命興師伐殷，殺武庚祿父、管叔，放蔡叔，以武庚殷餘民封康叔為衛君，居河、淇閒故商墟。

translations.text: Zhou Gong Dan with Cheng Wang command raised troops attacked Yin, killed Wu Geng Lu Fu, Guan Shu, banished Cai Shu, with Wu Geng Yin remaining people enfeoffed Kang Shu as Wei lord, resided Yellow River, Qi between former Yin old capital.

Wu Wang already conquered Yin Zhou, again with Yin remaining people enfeoffed Zhou son Wu Geng Lu Fu, compared to feudal lords, to serve their previous sacrifices not cut off. For Wu Geng not gathered, feared his have traitor heart, Wu Wang then ordered his younger brother Guan Shu, Cai Shu teach mutually Wu Geng Lu Fu, to harmonize their people. Wu Wang already collapsed, Cheng Wang young. Zhou Gong Dan replaced Cheng Wang govern, held country. Guan Shu, Cai Shu doubted Zhou Gong, then with Wu Geng Lu Fu made disorder, wished attack Cheng Zhou. Zhou Gong Dan with Cheng Wang command raised troops attacked Yin, killed Wu Geng Lu Fu, Guan Shu, banished Cai Shu, with Wu Geng Yin remaining people enfeoffed Kang Shu as Wei lord, resided Yellow River, Qi between former Yin old capital.

sentences.zh: 周公旦懼康叔齒少，乃申告康叔曰：「必求殷之賢人君子長者，問其先殷所以興，所以亡，而務愛民。」

translations.text: Zhou Gong Dan feared Kang Shu teeth young, then declared warned Kang Shu said: 'Must seek Yin worthy people gentlemen elders, ask their previous Yin so rise, so perish, while diligently love people.'

sentences.zh: 告以紂所以亡者以淫於酒，酒之失，婦人是用，故紂之亂自此始。

translations.text: Informed Zhou so perish because lewd in wine, wine's loss, women used it, so Zhou chaos from this began.

sentences.zh: 為梓材，示君子可法則。

translations.text: Made Zi Cai, showed gentlemen can follow rule.

sentences.zh: 故謂之《康誥》、《酒誥》、《梓材》以命之。

translations.text: So called 'Kang Gao', 'Jiu Gao', 'Zi Cai' to command him.

sentences.zh: 康叔之國，既以此命，能和集其民，民大說。

translations.text: Kang Shu governed country, already with this command, able harmonize gather his people, people greatly pleased.

Zhou Gong Dan feared Kang Shu teeth young, then declared warned Kang Shu said: 'Must seek Yin worthy people gentlemen elders, ask their previous Yin so rise, so perish, while diligently love people.' Informed Zhou so perish because lewd in wine, wine's loss, women used it, so Zhou chaos from this began. Made Zi Cai, showed gentlemen can follow rule. So called 'Kang Gao', 'Jiu Gao', 'Zi Cai' to command him. Kang Shu governed country, already with this command, able harmonize gather his people, people greatly pleased.

sentences.zh: 成王長，用事，舉康叔為周司寇，賜衛寶祭器，以章有德。

translations.text: Cheng Wang grown, administered affairs, raised Kang Shu as Zhou Si Kou, granted Wei treasure sacrificial vessels, to manifest have virtue.
Cheng Wang grown, administered affairs, raised Kang Shu as Zhou Si Kou, granted Wei treasure sacrificial vessels, to manifest have virtue.

sentences.zh: 康叔卒，子康伯代立。

translations.text: Kang Shu died, son Kang Bo replaced established.

sentences.zh: 康伯卒，子考伯立。

translations.text: Kang Bo died, son Kao Bo established.

sentences.zh: 考伯卒，子嗣伯立。

translations.text: Kao Bo died, son Si Bo established.

sentences.zh: 嗣伯卒，子偼伯立。

translations.text: Si Bo died, son Chou Bo established.

sentences.zh: 偼伯卒，子靖伯立。

translations.text: Chou Bo died, son Jing Bo established.

sentences.zh: 靖伯卒，子貞伯立。

translations.text: Jing Bo died, son Zhen Bo established.

sentences.zh: 貞伯卒，子頃侯立。

translations.text: Zhen Bo died, son Qing Hou established.

Kang Shu died, son Kang Bo replaced established. Kang Bo died, son Kao Bo established. Kao Bo died, son Si Bo established. Si Bo died, son Chou Bo established. Chou Bo died, son Jing Bo established. Jing Bo died, son Zhen Bo established. Zhen Bo died, son Qing Hou established.

sentences.zh: 頃侯厚賂周夷王，夷王命衛為侯。

translations.text: Qing Hou thick bribed Zhou Yi Wang, Yi Wang commanded Wei as hou.

sentences.zh: 頃侯立十二年卒，子釐侯立。

translations.text: Qing Hou established twelve years died, son Xi Hou established.
Qing Hou thick bribed Zhou Yi Wang, Yi Wang commanded Wei as hou. Qing Hou established twelve years died, son Xi Hou established.

sentences.zh: 釐侯十三年，周厲王出奔于彘，共和行政焉。

translations.text: Xi Hou thirteen years, Zhou Li Wang went fleeing to Zhu, republican administered government.

sentences.zh: 二十八年，周宣王立。

translations.text: Twenty-eight years, Zhou Xuan Wang established.
Xi Hou thirteen years, Zhou Li Wang went fleeing to Zhu, republican administered government. Twenty-eight years, Zhou Xuan Wang established.

sentences.zh: 四十二年，釐侯卒，太子共伯餘立為君。

translations.text: Forty-two years, Xi Hou died, crown prince Gong Bo Yu established as lord.

sentences.zh: 共伯弟和有寵於釐侯，多予之賂；

translations.text: Gong Bo younger brother He had favor at Xi Hou, many gave him bribes;

sentences.zh: 和以其賂賂士，以襲攻共伯於墓上，共伯入釐侯羨自殺。

translations.text: He with his bribes bribed scholars, to attack Gong Bo at tomb, Gong Bo entered Xi Hou tomb self killed.

sentences.zh: 衛人因葬之釐侯旁，謚曰共伯，而立和為衛侯，是為武公。

translations.text: Wei people because buried him Xi Hou side, posthumous Gong Bo, established He as Wei Hou, this was Wu Gong.

Forty-two years, Xi Hou died, crown prince Gong Bo Yu established as lord. Gong Bo younger brother He had favor at Xi Hou, many gave him bribes; He with his bribes bribed scholars, to attack Gong Bo at tomb, Gong Bo entered Xi Hou tomb self killed. Wei people because buried him Xi Hou side, posthumous Gong Bo, established He as Wei Hou, this was Wu Gong.

sentences.zh: 武公即位，修康叔之政，百姓和集。

translations.text: Wu Gong ascended position, repaired Kang Shu government, hundred clans harmonized gathered.

sentences.zh: 四十二年，犬戎殺周幽王，武公將兵往佐周平戎，甚有功，周平王命武公為公。

translations.text: Forty-two years, Quan Rong killed Zhou You Wang, Wu Gong led troops went assisted Zhou pacified Rong, very had merit, Zhou Ping Wang commanded Wu Gong as gong.

sentences.zh: 五十五年，卒，子莊公揚立。

translations.text: Fifty-five years, died, son Zhuang Gong Yang established.

Wu Gong ascended position, repaired Kang Shu government, hundred clans harmonized gathered. Forty-two years, Quan Rong killed Zhou You Wang, Wu Gong led troops went assisted Zhou pacified Rong, very had merit, Zhou Ping Wang commanded Wu Gong as gong. Fifty-five years, died, son Zhuang Gong Yang established.

sentences.zh: 莊公五年，取齊女為夫人，好而無子。

translations.text: Zhuang Gong five years, took Qi woman as wife, good but no sons.

sentences.zh: 又取陳女為夫人，生子，蚤死。

translations.text: Again took Chen woman as wife, gave birth son, early died.

sentences.zh: 陳女女弟亦幸於莊公，而生子完。

translations.text: Chen woman younger sister also favored by Zhuang Gong, gave birth son Wan.

sentences.zh: 完母死，莊公令夫人齊女子之，立為太子。

translations.text: Wan mother died, Zhuang Gong ordered wife Qi woman raise him, established as crown prince.

sentences.zh: 莊公有寵妾，生子州吁。

translations.text: Zhuang Gong had favored concubine, gave birth son Zhou Xu.

sentences.zh: 十八年，州吁長，好兵，莊公使將。

translations.text: Eighteen years, Zhou Xu grown, liked troops, Zhuang Gong made lead.

sentences.zh: 石碏諫莊公曰：「庶子好兵，使將，亂自此起。」

translations.text: Shi Que advised Zhuang Gong said: 'Secondary son like troops, made lead, disorder from this rises.'

sentences.zh: 不聽。

translations.text: Not listened.

sentences.zh: 二十三年，莊公卒，太子完立，是為桓公。

translations.text: Twenty-three years, Zhuang Gong died, crown prince Wan established, this was Huan Gong.

Zhuang Gong five years, took Qi woman as wife, good but no sons. Again took Chen woman as wife, gave birth son, early died. Chen woman younger sister also favored by Zhuang Gong, gave birth son Wan. Wan mother died, Zhuang Gong ordered wife Qi woman raise him, established as crown prince. Zhuang Gong had favored concubine, gave birth son Zhou Xu. Eighteen years, Zhou Xu grown, liked troops, Zhuang Gong made lead. Shi Que advised Zhuang Gong said: 'Secondary son like troops, made lead, disorder from this rises.' Not listened. Twenty-three years, Zhuang Gong died, crown prince Wan established, this was Huan Gong.

sentences.zh: 桓公二年，弟州吁驕奢，桓公絀之，州吁出奔。

translations.text: Huan Gong second year, younger brother Zhou Xu arrogant extravagant, Huan Gong reduced him, Zhou Xu went fleeing.

sentences.zh: 十三年，鄭伯弟段攻其兄，不勝，亡，而州吁求與之友。

translations.text: Thirteenth year, Zheng Bo younger brother Duan attacked his elder brother, not win, fled, Zhou Xu sought with him befriend.

sentences.zh: 十六年，州吁收聚衛亡人以襲殺桓公，州吁自立為衛君。

translations.text: Sixteenth year, Zhou Xu gathered Wei fled people to attack killed Huan Gong, Zhou Xu self established as Wei lord.

sentences.zh: 為鄭伯弟段欲伐鄭，請宋、陳、蔡與俱，三國皆許州吁。

translations.text: For Zheng Bo younger brother Duan wished attack Zheng, requested Song, Chen, Cai with him, three countries all permitted Zhou Xu.

sentences.zh: 州吁新立，好兵，弒桓公，衛人皆不愛。

translations.text: Zhou Xu newly established, liked troops, assassinated Huan Gong, Wei people all not loved.

sentences.zh: 石碏乃因桓公母家於陳，詳為善州吁。

translations.text: Shi Que then took advantage Huan Gong mother family at Chen, feigned good to Zhou Xu.

sentences.zh: 至鄭郊，石碏與陳侯共謀，使右宰丑進食，因殺州吁于濮，而迎桓公弟晉於邢而立之，是為宣公。

translations.text: To Zheng suburbs, Shi Que with Chen Hou together plotted, made right chief steward Chou advance food, because killed Zhou Xu at Pu, welcomed Huan Gong younger brother Jin at Xing established him, this was Xuan Gong.

Huan Gong second year, younger brother Zhou Xu arrogant extravagant, Huan Gong reduced him, Zhou Xu went fleeing. Thirteenth year, Zheng Bo younger brother Duan attacked his elder brother, not win, fled, Zhou Xu sought with him befriend. Sixteenth year, Zhou Xu gathered Wei fled people to attack killed Huan Gong, Zhou Xu self established as Wei lord. For Zheng Bo younger brother Duan wished attack Zheng, requested Song, Chen, Cai with him, three countries all permitted Zhou Xu. Zhou Xu newly established, liked troops, assassinated Huan Gong, Wei people all not loved. Shi Que then took advantage Huan Gong mother family at Chen, feigned good to Zhou Xu. To Zheng suburbs, Shi Que with Chen Hou together plotted, made right chief steward Chou advance food, because killed Zhou Xu at Pu, welcomed Huan Gong younger brother Jin at Xing established him, this was Xuan Gong.

sentences.zh: 宣公七年，魯弒其君隱公。

translations.text: Xuan Gong seventh year, Lu assassinated their lord Yin Gong.

sentences.zh: 九年，宋督弒其君殤公，及孔父。

translations.text: Nine years, Song Du assassinated their lord Shang Gong, and Kong Fu.

sentences.zh: 十年，晉曲沃莊伯弒其君哀侯。

translations.text: Tenth year, Jin Qu Wo Zhuang Bo assassinated their lord Ai Hou.
Xuan Gong seventh year, Lu assassinated their lord Yin Gong. Nine years, Song Du assassinated their lord Shang Gong, and Kong Fu. Tenth year, Jin Qu Wo Zhuang Bo assassinated their lord Ai Hou.

sentences.zh: 十八年，初，宣公愛夫人夷姜，夷姜生子伋，以為太子，而令右公子傅之。

translations.text: Eighteenth year, initially, Xuan Gong loved wife Yi Jiang, Yi Jiang gave birth son Ji, made him crown prince, ordered right gong zi teach him.

sentences.zh: 右公子為太子取齊女，未入室，而宣公見所欲為太子婦者好，說而自取之，更為太子取他女。

translations.text: Right gong zi for crown prince took Qi woman, not entered chamber, Xuan Gong saw desired as crown prince wife good, pleased self took her, moreover for crown prince took other woman.

sentences.zh: 宣公得齊女，生子壽、子朔，令左公子傅之。

translations.text: Xuan Gong obtained Qi woman, gave birth son Shou, Zi Shuo, ordered left gong zi teach them.

sentences.zh: 太子伋母死，宣公正夫人與朔共讒惡太子伋。

translations.text: Crown prince Ji mother died, Xuan Gong proper wife with Shuo together slandered harmed crown prince Ji.

sentences.zh: 宣公自以其奪太子妻也，心惡太子，欲廢之。

translations.text: Xuan Gong self with his seize crown prince wife, heart hated crown prince, wished abolish him.

sentences.zh: 及聞其惡，大怒，乃使太子伋於齊而令盜遮界上殺之，與太子白旄，而告界盜見持白旄者殺之。

translations.text: To heard his evil, greatly angered, then sent crown prince Ji to Qi ordered thief block border kill him, gave crown prince white banner, informed border thief see hold white banner kill him.

sentences.zh: 且行，子朔之兄壽，太子異母弟也，知朔之惡太子而君欲殺之，乃謂太子曰：「界盜見太子白旄，即殺太子，太子可毋行。」

translations.text: About go, Zi Shuo's elder brother Shou, crown prince different mother younger brother, knew Shuo's harm crown prince but lord wished kill him, then told crown prince said: 'Border thief see crown prince white banner, then kill crown prince, crown prince can not go.'

sentences.zh: 太子曰：「逆父命求生，不可。」

translations.text: Crown prince said: 'Go against father command seek life, cannot.'

sentences.zh: 遂行。

translations.text: Then went.

sentences.zh: 壽見太子不止，乃盜其白旄而先馳至界。

translations.text: Shou saw crown prince not stop, then stole his white banner first galloped to border.

sentences.zh: 界盜見其驗，即殺之。

translations.text: Border thief saw his token, then killed him.

sentences.zh: 壽已死，而太子伋又至，謂盜曰：「所當殺乃我也。」

translations.text: Shou already died, crown prince Ji moreover arrived, told thief said: 'What should kill is me.'

sentences.zh: 盜并殺太子伋，以報宣公。

translations.text: Thief together killed crown prince Ji, to report Xuan Gong.

sentences.zh: 宣公乃以子朔為太子。

translations.text: Xuan Gong then made Zi Shuo crown prince.

sentences.zh: 十九年，宣公卒，太子朔立，是為惠公。

translations.text: Nineteen years, Xuan Gong died, crown prince Shuo established, this was Hui Gong.

Eighteenth year, initially, Xuan Gong loved wife Yi Jiang, Yi Jiang gave birth son Ji, made him crown prince, ordered right gong zi teach him. Right gong zi for crown prince took Qi woman, not entered chamber, Xuan Gong saw desired as crown prince wife good, pleased self took her, moreover for crown prince took other woman. Xuan Gong obtained Qi woman, gave birth son Shou, Zi Shuo, ordered left gong zi teach them. Crown prince Ji mother died, Xuan Gong proper wife with Shuo together slandered harmed crown prince Ji. Xuan Gong self with his seize crown prince wife, heart hated crown prince, wished abolish him. To heard his evil, greatly angered, then sent crown prince Ji to Qi ordered thief block border kill him, gave crown prince white banner, informed border thief see hold white banner kill him. About go, Zi Shuo's elder brother Shou, crown prince different mother younger brother, knew Shuo's harm crown prince but lord wished kill him, then told crown prince said: 'Border thief see crown prince white banner, then kill crown prince, crown prince can not go.' Crown prince said: 'Go against father command seek life, cannot.' Then went. Shou saw crown prince not stop, then stole his white banner first galloped to border. Border thief saw his token, then killed him. Shou already died, crown prince Ji moreover arrived, told thief said: 'What should kill is me.' Thief together killed crown prince Ji, to report Xuan Gong. Xuan Gong then made Zi Shuo crown prince. Nineteen years, Xuan Gong died, crown prince Shuo established, this was Hui Gong.

sentences.zh: 左右公子不平朔之立也，惠公四年，左右公子怨惠公之讒殺前太子伋而代立，乃作亂，攻惠公，立太子伋之弟黔牟為君，惠公奔齊。

translations.text: Left right gong zi not fair Shuo's establishment, Hui Gong four years, left right gong zi resented Hui Gong's slander kill previous crown prince Ji replaced established, then made disorder, attacked Hui Gong, established crown prince Ji's younger brother Qian Mou as lord, Hui Gong fled Qi.

Left right gong zi not fair Shuo's establishment, Hui Gong four years, left right gong zi resented Hui Gong's slander kill previous crown prince Ji replaced established, then made disorder, attacked Hui Gong, established crown prince Ji's younger brother Qian Mou as lord, Hui Gong fled Qi.

sentences.zh: 衛君黔牟立八年，齊襄公率諸侯奉王命共伐衛，納衛惠公，誅左右公子。

translations.text: Wei lord Qian Mou established eight years, Qi Xiang Gong led feudal lords received Wang command together attacked Wei, entered Wei Hui Gong, executed left right gong zi.

sentences.zh: 衛君黔牟奔于周，惠公復立。

translations.text: Wei lord Qian Mou fled to Zhou, Hui Gong restored established.

sentences.zh: 惠公立三年出亡，亡八年復入，與前通年凡十三年矣。

translations.text: Hui Gong established three years went fleeing, fled eight years re-entered, with previous together years altogether thirteen years.

Wei lord Qian Mou established eight years, Qi Xiang Gong led feudal lords received Wang command together attacked Wei, entered Wei Hui Gong, executed left right gong zi. Wei lord Qian Mou fled to Zhou, Hui Gong restored established. Hui Gong established three years went fleeing, fled eight years re-entered, with previous together years altogether thirteen years.

sentences.zh: 二十五年，惠公怨周之容舍黔牟，與燕伐周。

translations.text: Twenty-five years, Hui Gong resented Zhou's contain house Qian Mou, with Yan attacked Zhou.

sentences.zh: 周惠王奔溫，衛、燕立惠王弟穨為王。

translations.text: Zhou Hui Wang fled Wen, Wei, Yan established Hui Wang younger brother Sui as Wang.

sentences.zh: 二十九年，鄭復納惠王。

translations.text: Twenty-nine years, Zheng again entered Hui Wang.

sentences.zh: 三十一年，惠公卒，子懿公赤立。

translations.text: Thirty-one years, Hui Gong died, son Yi Gong Chi established.

Twenty-five years, Hui Gong resented Zhou's contain house Qian Mou, with Yan attacked Zhou. Zhou Hui Wang fled Wen, Wei, Yan established Hui Wang younger brother Sui as Wang. Twenty-nine years, Zheng again entered Hui Wang. Thirty-one years, Hui Gong died, son Yi Gong Chi established.

sentences.zh: 懿公即位，好鶴，淫樂奢侈。

translations.text: Yi Gong ascended position, liked cranes, lewd music extravagant.

sentences.zh: 九年，翟伐衛，衛懿公欲發兵，兵或畔。

translations.text: Nine years, Di attacked Wei, Wei Yi Gong wished send troops, troops or rebelled.

sentences.zh: 大臣言曰：「君好鶴，鶴可令擊翟。」

translations.text: Ministers said: 'Lord likes cranes, cranes can order attack Di.'

sentences.zh: 翟於是遂入，殺懿公。

translations.text: Di then entered, killed Yi Gong.

Yi Gong ascended position, liked cranes, lewd music extravagant. Nine years, Di attacked Wei, Wei Yi Gong wished send troops, troops or rebelled. Ministers said: 'Lord likes cranes, cranes can order attack Di.' Di then entered, killed Yi Gong.

sentences.zh: 懿公之立也，百姓大臣皆不服。

translations.text: Yi Gong's establishment, hundred clans ministers all not submitted.

sentences.zh: 自懿公父惠公朔之讒殺太子伋代立至於懿公，常欲敗之，卒滅惠公之後而更立黔牟之弟昭伯頑之子申為君，是為戴公。

translations.text: From Yi Gong father Hui Gong Shuo's slander kill crown prince Ji replaced established to Yi Gong, often wished defeat him, finally extinguished Hui Gong's descendants moreover established Qian Mou's younger brother Zhao Bo Wan son Shen as lord, this was Dai Gong.

Yi Gong's establishment, hundred clans ministers all not submitted. From Yi Gong father Hui Gong Shuo's slander kill crown prince Ji replaced established to Yi Gong, often wished defeat him, finally extinguished Hui Gong's descendants moreover established Qian Mou's younger brother Zhao Bo Wan son Shen as lord, this was Dai Gong.

sentences.zh: 戴公申元年卒。

translations.text: Dai Gong Shen first year died.

sentences.zh: 齊桓公以衛數亂，乃率諸侯伐翟，為衛筑楚丘，立戴公弟燬為衛君，是為文公。

translations.text: Qi Huan Gong because Wei several disorder, then led feudal lords attacked Di, for Wei built Chu Qiu, established Dai Gong younger brother Hui as Wei lord, this was Wen Gong.

sentences.zh: 文公以亂故奔齊，齊人入之。

translations.text: Wen Gong because disorder fled Qi, Qi people entered him.

Dai Gong Shen first year died. Qi Huan Gong because Wei several disorder, then led feudal lords attacked Di, for Wei built Chu Qiu, established Dai Gong younger brother Hui as Wei lord, this was Wen Gong. Wen Gong because disorder fled Qi, Qi people entered him.

sentences.zh: 初，翟殺懿公也，衛人憐之，思復立宣公前死太子伋之後，伋子又死，而代伋死者子壽又無子。

translations.text: Initially, Di killed Yi Gong, Wei people pitied him, thought again establish Xuan Gong previous died crown prince Ji's descendants, Ji son moreover died, replaced Ji died son Shou moreover no sons.

sentences.zh: 太子伋同母弟二人：其一曰黔牟，黔牟嘗代惠公為君，八年復去；

translations.text: Crown prince Ji same mother younger brothers two: one called Qian Mou, Qian Mou once replaced Hui Gong as lord, eight years again left;

sentences.zh: 其二曰昭伯。

translations.text: its two called Zhao Bo.

sentences.zh: 昭伯、黔牟皆已前死，故立昭伯子申為戴公。

translations.text: Zhao Bo, Qian Mou all already previous died, so established Zhao Bo son Shen as Dai Gong.

sentences.zh: 戴公卒，復立其弟燬為文公。

translations.text: Dai Gong died, again established his younger brother Hui as Wen Gong.

Initially, Di killed Yi Gong, Wei people pitied him, thought again establish Xuan Gong previous died crown prince Ji's descendants, Ji son moreover died, replaced Ji died son Shou moreover no sons. Crown prince Ji same mother younger brothers two: one called Qian Mou, Qian Mou once replaced Hui Gong as lord, eight years again left; its two called Zhao Bo. Zhao Bo, Qian Mou all already previous died, so established Zhao Bo son Shen as Dai Gong. Dai Gong died, again established his younger brother Hui as Wen Gong.

sentences.zh: 文公初立，輕賦平罪，身自勞，與百姓同苦，以收衛民。

translations.text: Wen Gong initially established, light taxes fair punishments, body self labored, with hundred clans same bitter, to gather Wei people.
Wen Gong initially established, light taxes fair punishments, body self labored, with hundred clans same bitter, to gather Wei people.

sentences.zh: 十六年，晉公子重耳過，無禮。

translations.text: Sixteen years, Jin gong zi Chong Er passed, no rites.

sentences.zh: 十七年，齊桓公卒。

translations.text: Seventeen years, Qi Huan Gong died.

sentences.zh: 二十五年，文公卒，子成公鄭立。

translations.text: Twenty-five years, Wen Gong died, son Cheng Gong Zheng established.
Sixteen years, Jin gong zi Chong Er passed, no rites. Seventeen years, Qi Huan Gong died. Twenty-five years, Wen Gong died, son Cheng Gong Zheng established.

sentences.zh: 成公三年，晉欲假道於衛救宋，成公不許。

translations.text: Cheng Gong third year, Jin wished borrow road at Wei save Song, Cheng Gong not permitted.

sentences.zh: 晉更從南河度，救宋。

translations.text: Jin moreover from south Yellow River crossed, saved Song.

sentences.zh: 徵師於衛，衛大夫欲許，成公不肯。

translations.text: Requested troops at Wei, Wei grand masters wished permit, Cheng Gong not willing.

sentences.zh: 大夫元咺攻成公，成公出奔。

translations.text: Grand master Yuan Xian attacked Cheng Gong, Cheng Gong went fleeing.

sentences.zh: 晉文公重耳伐衛，分其地予宋，討前過無禮及不救宋患也。

translations.text: Jin Wen Gong Chong Er attacked Wei, divided its land gave Song, punished previous excess no rites and not save Song trouble.

sentences.zh: 衛成公遂出奔陳。

translations.text: Wei Cheng Gong then went fleeing Chen.

sentences.zh: 二歲，如周求入，與晉文公會。

translations.text: Second year, went to Zhou sought enter, with Jin Wen Gong assembled.

sentences.zh: 晉使人鴆衛成公，成公私於周主鴆，令薄，得不死。

translations.text: Jin made person poisoned Wei Cheng Gong, Cheng Gong privately with Zhou lord poison, ordered thin, not died.

sentences.zh: 已而周為請晉文公，卒入之衛，而誅元咺，衛君瑕出奔。

translations.text: Already then Zhou for requested Jin Wen Gong, finally entered him Wei, executed Yuan Xian, Wei lord Xia went fleeing.

sentences.zh: 七年，晉文公卒。

translations.text: Seventh year, Jin Wen Gong died.

sentences.zh: 十二年，成公朝晉襄公。

translations.text: Twelfth year, Cheng Gong court Jin Xiang Gong.

sentences.zh: 十四年，秦穆公卒。

translations.text: Fourteenth year, Qin Mu Gong died.

sentences.zh: 二十六年，齊邴歜弒其君懿公。

translations.text: Twenty-sixth year, Qi Bing Xian assassinated their lord Yi Gong.

sentences.zh: 三十五年，成公卒，子穆公遫立。

translations.text: Thirty-five years, Cheng Gong died, son Mu Gong Su established.

Cheng Gong third year, Jin wished borrow road at Wei save Song, Cheng Gong not permitted. Jin moreover from south Yellow River crossed, saved Song. Requested troops at Wei, Wei grand masters wished permit, Cheng Gong not willing. Grand master Yuan Xian attacked Cheng Gong, Cheng Gong went fleeing. Jin Wen Gong Chong Er attacked Wei, divided its land gave Song, punished previous excess no rites and not save Song trouble. Wei Cheng Gong then went fleeing Chen. Second year, went to Zhou sought enter, with Jin Wen Gong assembled. Jin made person poisoned Wei Cheng Gong, Cheng Gong privately with Zhou lord poison, ordered thin, not died. Already then Zhou for requested Jin Wen Gong, finally entered him Wei, executed Yuan Xian, Wei lord Xia went fleeing. Seventh year, Jin Wen Gong died. Twelfth year, Cheng Gong court Jin Xiang Gong. Fourteenth year, Qin Mu Gong died. Twenty-sixth year, Qi Bing Xian assassinated their lord Yi Gong. Thirty-five years, Cheng Gong died, son Mu Gong Su established.

sentences.zh: 穆公二年，楚莊王伐陳，殺夏徵舒。

translations.text: Mu Gong second year, Chu Zhuang Wang attacked Chen, killed Xia Zheng Shu.

sentences.zh: 三年，楚莊王圍鄭，鄭降，復釋之。

translations.text: Third year, Chu Zhuang Wang surrounded Zheng, Zheng surrendered, again released it.

sentences.zh: 十一年，孫良夫救魯伐齊，復得侵地。

translations.text: Eleventh year, Sun Liang Fu saved Lu attacked Qi, again obtained invaded land.

sentences.zh: 穆公卒，子定公臧立。

translations.text: Mu Gong died, son Ding Gong Cang established.

sentences.zh: 定公十二年卒，子獻公衎立。

translations.text: Ding Gong twelfth year died, son Xian Gong Kan established.

Mu Gong second year, Chu Zhuang Wang attacked Chen, killed Xia Zheng Shu. Third year, Chu Zhuang Wang surrounded Zheng, Zheng surrendered, again released it. Eleventh year, Sun Liang Fu saved Lu attacked Qi, again obtained invaded land. Mu Gong died, son Ding Gong Cang established. Ding Gong twelfth year died, son Xian Gong Kan established.

sentences.zh: 獻公十三年，公令師曹教宮妾鼓琴，妾不善，曹笞之。

translations.text: Xian Gong thirteenth year, duke ordered teacher Cao teach palace concubines play qin, concubine not good, Cao whipped her.

sentences.zh: 妾以幸惡曹於公，公亦笞曹三百。

translations.text: Concubine with favor slandered Cao to duke, duke also whipped Cao three hundred.

sentences.zh: 十八年，獻公戒孫文子、甯惠子食，皆往。

translations.text: Eighteenth year, Xian Gong warned Sun Wen Zi, Ning Hui Zi eat, all went.

sentences.zh: 日旰不召，而去射鴻於囿。

translations.text: Day late not summoned, went shoot geese at park.

sentences.zh: 二子從之，公不釋射服與之言。

translations.text: Two sons followed him, duke not removed shooting clothes spoke with them.

sentences.zh: 二子怒，如宿。

translations.text: Two sons angered, went to Su.

sentences.zh: 孫文子子數侍公飲，使師曹歌巧言之卒章。

translations.text: Sun Wen Zi son several served duke drink, made teacher Cao sing clever words final chapter.

sentences.zh: 師曹又怒公之嘗笞三百，乃歌之，欲以怒孫文子，報衛獻公。

translations.text: Teacher Cao moreover angered duke's once whipped three hundred, then sang it, wished anger Sun Wen Zi, report Wei Xian Gong.

sentences.zh: 文子語蘧伯玉，伯玉曰：「臣不知也。」

translations.text: Wen Zi told Qu Bo Yu, Bo Yu said: 'Minister not know.'

sentences.zh: 遂攻出獻公。

translations.text: Then attacked expelled Xian Gong.

sentences.zh: 獻公奔齊，齊置衛獻公於聚邑。

translations.text: Xian Gong fled Qi, Qi placed Wei Xian Gong at Ju yi.

sentences.zh: 孫文子、甯惠子共立定公弟秋為衛君，是為殤公。

translations.text: Sun Wen Zi, Ning Hui Zi together established Ding Gong younger brother Qiu as Wei lord, this was Shang Gong.

Xian Gong thirteenth year, duke ordered teacher Cao teach palace concubines play qin, concubine not good, Cao whipped her. Concubine with favor slandered Cao to duke, duke also whipped Cao three hundred. Eighteenth year, Xian Gong warned Sun Wen Zi, Ning Hui Zi eat, all went. Day late not summoned, went shoot geese at park. Two sons followed him, duke not removed shooting clothes spoke with them. Two sons angered, went to Su. Sun Wen Zi son several served duke drink, made teacher Cao sing clever words final chapter. Teacher Cao moreover angered duke's once whipped three hundred, then sang it, wished anger Sun Wen Zi, report Wei Xian Gong. Wen Zi told Qu Bo Yu, Bo Yu said: 'Minister not know.' Then attacked expelled Xian Gong. Xian Gong fled Qi, Qi placed Wei Xian Gong at Ju yi. Sun Wen Zi, Ning Hui Zi together established Ding Gong younger brother Qiu as Wei lord, this was Shang Gong.

sentences.zh: 殤公秋立，封孫文子林父於宿。

translations.text: Shang Gong Qiu established, enfeoffed Sun Wen Zi Lin Fu at Su.

sentences.zh: 十二年，甯喜與孫林父爭寵相惡，殤公使甯喜攻孫林父。

translations.text: Twelfth year, Ning Xi with Sun Lin Fu contended favor mutually hated, Shang Gong made Ning Xi attack Sun Lin Fu.

sentences.zh: 林父奔晉，復求入故衛獻公。

translations.text: Lin Fu fled Jin, again sought enter former Wei Xian Gong.

sentences.zh: 獻公在齊，齊景公聞之，與衛獻公如晉求入。

translations.text: Xian Gong in Qi, Qi Jing Gong heard it, with Wei Xian Gong went to Jin sought enter.

sentences.zh: 晉為伐衛，誘與盟。

translations.text: Jin for attacked Wei, lured allied with him.

sentences.zh: 衛殤公會晉平公，平公執殤公與甯喜而復入衛獻公。

translations.text: Wei Shang Gong assembled Jin Ping Gong, Ping Gong captured Shang Gong with Ning Xi returned entered Wei Xian Gong.

sentences.zh: 獻公亡在外十二年而入。

translations.text: Xian Gong fled outside twelve years entered.

Shang Gong Qiu established, enfeoffed Sun Wen Zi Lin Fu at Su. Twelfth year, Ning Xi with Sun Lin Fu contended favor mutually hated, Shang Gong made Ning Xi attack Sun Lin Fu. Lin Fu fled Jin, again sought enter former Wei Xian Gong. Xian Gong in Qi, Qi Jing Gong heard it, with Wei Xian Gong went to Jin sought enter. Jin for attacked Wei, lured allied with him. Wei Shang Gong assembled Jin Ping Gong, Ping Gong captured Shang Gong with Ning Xi returned entered Wei Xian Gong. Xian Gong fled outside twelve years entered.

sentences.zh: 獻公後元年，誅甯喜。

translations.text: Xian Gong after first year, executed Ning Xi.
Xian Gong after first year, executed Ning Xi.

sentences.zh: 三年，吳延陵季子使過衛，見蘧伯玉、史，曰：「衛多君子，其國無故。」

translations.text: Third year, Wu Yan Ling Ji Zi sent passed Wei, saw Qu Bo Yu, Shi, said: 'Wei many gentlemen, their country no calamity.'

sentences.zh: 過宿，孫林父為擊磬，曰：「不樂，音大悲，使衛亂乃此矣。」

translations.text: Passed Su, Sun Lin Fu for struck chime stones, said: 'Not happy, sound greatly sad, make Wei disorder then this.'

sentences.zh: 是年，獻公卒，子襄公惡立。

translations.text: This year, Xian Gong died, son Xiang Gong Wu established.

Third year, Wu Yan Ling Ji Zi sent passed Wei, saw Qu Bo Yu, Shi, said: 'Wei many gentlemen, their country no calamity.' Passed Su, Sun Lin Fu for struck chime stones, said: 'Not happy, sound greatly sad, make Wei disorder then this.' This year, Xian Gong died, son Xiang Gong Wu established.

sentences.zh: 襄公六年，楚靈王會諸侯，襄公稱病不往。

translations.text: Xiang Gong sixth year, Chu Ling Wang assembled feudal lords, Xiang Gong claimed illness not went.
Xiang Gong sixth year, Chu Ling Wang assembled feudal lords, Xiang Gong claimed illness not went.

sentences.zh: 九年，襄公卒。

translations.text: Ninth year, Xiang Gong died.

sentences.zh: 初，襄公有賤妾，幸之，有身，夢有人謂曰：「我康叔也，令若子必有衛，名而子曰『元』。」

translations.text: Initially, Xiang Gong had lowly concubine, favored her, had body, dreamed someone told said: 'I Kang Shu, command your son must have Wei, name your son 'Yuan'.'

sentences.zh: 妾怪之，問孔成子。

translations.text: Concubine strange it, asked Kong Cheng Zi.

sentences.zh: 成子曰：「康叔者，衛祖也。」

translations.text: Cheng Zi said: 'Kang Shu, Wei ancestor.'

sentences.zh: 及生子，男也，以告襄公。

translations.text: To gave birth son, male, informed Xiang Gong.

sentences.zh: 襄公曰：「天所置也。」

translations.text: Xiang Gong said: 'Heaven placed.'

sentences.zh: 名之曰元。

translations.text: Named him Yuan.

sentences.zh: 襄公夫人無子，於是乃立元為嗣，是為靈公。

translations.text: Xiang Gong wife no sons, then established Yuan as heir, this was Ling Gong.

Ninth year, Xiang Gong died. Initially, Xiang Gong had lowly concubine, favored her, had body, dreamed someone told said: 'I Kang Shu, command your son must have Wei, name your son 'Yuan'.'  Concubine strange it, asked Kong Cheng Zi. Cheng Zi said: 'Kang Shu, Wei ancestor.' To gave birth son, male, informed Xiang Gong. Xiang Gong said: 'Heaven placed.' Named him Yuan. Xiang Gong wife no sons, then established Yuan as heir, this was Ling Gong.

sentences.zh: 四十二年春，靈公游于郊，令子郢仆。

translations.text: Forty-two years spring, Ling Gong toured suburbs, ordered Zi Ying drive carriage.

sentences.zh: 郢，靈公少子也，字子南。

translations.text: Ying, Ling Gong youngest son, courtesy Zi Nan.

sentences.zh: 靈公怨太子出奔，謂郢曰：「我將立若為後。」

translations.text: Ling Gong resented crown prince went fleeing, told Ying said: 'I will establish you as successor.'

sentences.zh: 郢對曰：「郢不足以辱社稷，君更圖之。」

translations.text: Ying answered said: 'Ying insufficient to disgrace altars millet, lord moreover plan it.'

sentences.zh: 夏，靈公卒，夫人命子郢為太子，曰：「此靈公命也。」

translations.text: Summer, Ling Gong died, wife ordered Zi Ying as crown prince, said: 'This Ling Gong command.'

sentences.zh: 郢曰：「亡人太子蒯聵之子輒在也，不敢當。」

translations.text: Ying said: 'Fled person crown prince Kuai Ting's son Zhe present, not dare receive.'

sentences.zh: 於是衛乃以輒為君，是為出公。

translations.text: Then Wei established Zhe as lord, this was Chu Gong.

Forty-two years spring, Ling Gong toured suburbs, ordered Zi Ying drive carriage. Ying, Ling Gong youngest son, courtesy Zi Nan. Ling Gong resented crown prince went fleeing, told Ying said: 'I will establish you as successor.' Ying answered said: 'Ying insufficient to disgrace altars millet, lord moreover plan it.' Summer, Ling Gong died, wife ordered Zi Ying as crown prince, said: 'This Ling Gong command.' Ying said: 'Fled person crown prince Kuai Ting's son Zhe present, not dare receive.' Then Wei established Zhe as lord, this was Chu Gong.

sentences.zh: 六月乙酉，趙簡子欲入蒯聵，乃令陽虎詐命衛十餘人衰绖歸，簡子送蒯聵。

translations.text: Sixth month Yi You, Zhao Jian Zi wished enter Kuai Ting, then ordered Yang Hu cheated ordered Wei over ten people mourning clothes returned, Jian Zi sent Kuai Ting.

sentences.zh: 衛人聞之，發兵擊蒯聵。

translations.text: Wei people heard it, sent troops attacked Kuai Ting.

sentences.zh: 蒯聵不得入，入宿而保，衛人亦罷兵。

translations.text: Kuai Ting not able enter, entered Su protected, Wei people also stopped troops.

Sixth month Yi You, Zhao Jian Zi wished enter Kuai Ting, then ordered Yang Hu cheated ordered Wei over ten people mourning clothes returned, Jian Zi sent Kuai Ting. Wei people heard it, sent troops attacked Kuai Ting. Kuai Ting not able enter, entered Su protected, Wei people also stopped troops.

sentences.zh: 出公輒四年，齊田乞弒其君孺子。

translations.text: Chu Gong Zhe fourth year, Qi Tian Qi assassinated their lord Ru Zi.

sentences.zh: 八年，齊鮑子弒其君悼公。

translations.text: Eighth year, Qi Bao Zi assassinated their lord Dao Gong.
Chu Gong Zhe fourth year, Qi Tian Qi assassinated their lord Ru Zi. Eighth year, Qi Bao Zi assassinated their lord Dao Gong.

sentences.zh: 孔子自陳入衛。

translations.text: Kong Qiu from Chen entered Wei.

sentences.zh: 九年，孔文子問兵於仲尼，仲尼不對。

translations.text: Ninth year, Kong Wen Zi asked troops about Zhong Ni, Zhong Ni not answered.

sentences.zh: 其後魯迎仲尼，仲尼反魯。

translations.text: After Ru welcomed Zhong Ni, Zhong Ni returned Ru.
Kong Qiu from Chen entered Wei. Ninth year, Kong Wen Zi asked troops about Zhong Ni, Zhong Ni not answered. After Ru welcomed Zhong Ni, Zhong Ni returned Ru.

sentences.zh: 十二年，初，孔圉文子取太子蒯聵之姊，生悝。

translations.text: Twelfth year, initially, Kong Yu Wen Zi took crown prince Kuai Ting's elder sister, gave birth Kui.

sentences.zh: 孔氏之豎渾良夫美好，孔文子卒，良夫通於悝母。

translations.text: Kong family's servant Hun Liang Fu beautiful good, Kong Wen Zi died, Liang Fu communicated with Kui mother.

sentences.zh: 太子在宿，悝母使良夫於太子。

translations.text: Crown prince in Su, Kui mother sent Liang Fu to crown prince.

sentences.zh: 太子與良夫言曰：「茍能入我國，報子以乘軒，免子三死，毋所與。」

translations.text: Crown prince with Liang Fu spoke said: 'If able enter my country, report you with chariot canopy, exempt you three deaths, nothing not give.'

sentences.zh: 與之盟，許以悝母為妻。

translations.text: Allied with him, permitted with Kui mother as wife.

sentences.zh: 閏月，良夫與太子入，舍孔氏之外圃。

translations.text: Leap month, Liang Fu with crown prince entered, resided Kong family outer garden.

sentences.zh: 昏，二人蒙衣而乘，宦者羅御，如孔氏。

translations.text: Dusk, two people covered clothes rode, eunuch Luo drove, went to Kong family.

sentences.zh: 孔氏之老欒甯問之，稱姻妾以告。

translations.text: Kong family's elder Luan Ning asked them, called relative concubine informed.

sentences.zh: 遂入，適伯姬氏。

translations.text: Then entered, went to Bo Ji Shi.

sentences.zh: 既食，悝母杖戈而先，太子與五人介，輿猳從之。

translations.text: Already ate, Kui mother held spear first, crown prince with five people armored, carried Kui followed.

sentences.zh: 伯姬劫悝於廁，彊盟之，遂劫以登臺。

translations.text: Bo Ji kidnapped Kui at toilet, strongly allied him, then kidnapped ascended tower.

sentences.zh: 欒甯將飲酒，炙未熟，聞亂，使告仲由。

translations.text: Luan Ning about drink wine, roast not ripe, heard disorder, sent informed Zhong You.

sentences.zh: 召護駕乘車，行爵食炙，奉出公輒奔魯。

translations.text: Summoned guard harnessed carriage, walked rank drank roast, served Chu Gong Zhe fled Ru.

Twelfth year, initially, Kong Yu Wen Zi took crown prince Kuai Ting's elder sister, gave birth Kui. Kong family's servant Hun Liang Fu beautiful good, Kong Wen Zi died, Liang Fu communicated with Kui mother. Crown prince in Su, Kui mother sent Liang Fu to crown prince. Crown prince with Liang Fu spoke said: 'If able enter my country, report you with chariot canopy, exempt you three deaths, nothing not give.' Allied with him, permitted with Kui mother as wife. Leap month, Liang Fu with crown prince entered, resided Kong family outer garden. Dusk, two people covered clothes rode, eunuch Luo drove, went to Kong family. Kong family's elder Luan Ning asked them, called relative concubine informed. Then entered, went to Bo Ji Shi. Already ate, Kui mother held spear first, crown prince with five people armored, carried Kui followed. Bo Ji kidnapped Kui at toilet, strongly allied him, then kidnapped ascended tower. Luan Ning about drink wine, roast not ripe, heard disorder, sent informed Zhong You. Summoned guard harnessed carriage, walked rank drank roast, served Chu Gong Zhe fled Ru.

sentences.zh: 仲由將入，遇子羔將出，曰：「門已閉矣。」

translations.text: Zhong You about enter, met Zi Gao about exit, said: 'Gate already closed.'

sentences.zh: 子路曰：「吾姑至矣。」

translations.text: Zi Lu said: 'I moreover go.'

sentences.zh: 子羔曰：「不及，莫踐其難。」

translations.text: Zi Gao said: 'Not reach, not step their difficulty.'

sentences.zh: 子路曰：「食焉不辟其難。」

translations.text: Zi Lu said: 'Eat then not avoid their difficulty.'

sentences.zh: 子羔遂出。

translations.text: Zi Gao then exited.

sentences.zh: 子路入，及門，公孫敢闔門，曰：「毋入為也！」

translations.text: Zi Lu entered, to gate, Gong Sun Gan closed gate, said: 'Do not enter for it!'

sentences.zh: 子路曰：「是公孫也？

translations.text: Zi Lu said: 'Is Gong Sun?

sentences.zh: 求利而逃其難。

translations.text: Seek profit escape their difficulty.

sentences.zh: 由不然，利其祿，必救其患。」

translations.text: You not so, profit their salary, must save their calamity.'

sentences.zh: 有使者出，子路乃得入。

translations.text: Had envoy exited, Zi Lu then able entered.

sentences.zh: 曰：「太子焉用孔悝？

translations.text: Said: 'Crown prince where use Kong Kui?

sentences.zh: 雖殺之，必或繼之。」

translations.text: Though kill him, must someone continue.'

sentences.zh: 且曰：「太子無勇。

translations.text: Moreover said: 'Crown prince no courage.

sentences.zh: 若燔臺，必舍孔叔。」

translations.text: If burn tower, must release Kong Shu.'

sentences.zh: 太子聞之，懼，下石乞、盂黶敵子路，以戈擊之，割纓。

translations.text: Crown prince heard it, feared, descended Shi Qi, Yu Xian attacked Zi Lu, with spear hit him, cut tassel.

sentences.zh: 子路曰：「君子死，冠不免。」

translations.text: Zi Lu said: 'Gentleman die, hat not remove.'

sentences.zh: 結纓而死。

translations.text: Tied tassel died.

sentences.zh: 孔子聞衛亂，曰：「嗟乎！

translations.text: Kong Qiu heard Wei disorder, said: 'Alas!

sentences.zh: 柴也其來乎？

translations.text: Chai then come?

sentences.zh: 由也其死矣。」

translations.text: You then die.'

sentences.zh: 孔悝竟立太子蒯聵，是為莊公。

translations.text: Kong Kui finally established crown prince Kuai Ting, this was Zhuang Gong.

Zhong You about enter, met Zi Gao about exit, said: 'Gate already closed.' Zi Lu said: 'I moreover go.' Zi Gao said: 'Not reach, not step their difficulty.' Zi Lu said: 'Eat then not avoid their difficulty.' Zi Gao then exited. Zi Lu entered, to gate, Gong Sun Gan closed gate, said: 'Do not enter for it!' Zi Lu said: 'Is Gong Sun? Seek profit escape their difficulty. You not so, profit their salary, must save their calamity.' Had envoy exited, Zi Lu then able entered. Said: 'Crown prince where use Kong Kui? Though kill him, must someone continue.' Moreover said: 'Crown prince no courage. If burn tower, must release Kong Shu.' Crown prince heard it, feared, descended Shi Qi, Yu Xian attacked Zi Lu, with spear hit him, cut tassel. Zi Lu said: 'Gentleman die, hat not remove.' Tied tassel died. Kong Qiu heard Wei disorder, said: 'Alas! Chai then come? You then die.' Kong Kui finally established crown prince Kuai Ting, this was Zhuang Gong.

sentences.zh: 莊公蒯聵者，出公父也，居外，怨大夫莫迎立。

translations.text: Zhuang Gong Kuai Ting, Chu Gong father, resided outside, resented grand masters none welcomed established.

sentences.zh: 元年即位，欲盡誅大臣，曰：「寡人居外久矣，子亦嘗聞之乎？」

translations.text: First year ascended position, wished completely execute ministers, said: 'I resided outside long, you also once heard it?'

sentences.zh: 群臣欲作亂，乃止。

translations.text: Group ministers wished make disorder, then stopped.

Zhuang Gong Kuai Ting, Chu Gong father, resided outside, resented grand masters none welcomed established. First year ascended position, wished completely execute ministers, said: 'I resided outside long, you also once heard it?' Group ministers wished make disorder, then stopped.

sentences.zh: 二年，魯孔丘卒。

translations.text: Second year, Ru Kong Qiu died.
Second year, Ru Kong Qiu died.

sentences.zh: 三年，莊公上城，見戎州。

translations.text: Third year, Zhuang Gong ascended city, saw Rong Zhou.

sentences.zh: 曰：「戎虜何為是？」

translations.text: Said: 'Rong captive why like this?'

sentences.zh: 戎州病之。

translations.text: Rong Zhou ill it.

sentences.zh: 十月，戎州告趙簡子，簡子圍衛。

translations.text: Tenth month, Rong Zhou informed Zhao Jian Zi, Jian Zi surrounded Wei.

sentences.zh: 十一月，莊公出奔，衛人立公子斑師為衛君。

translations.text: Eleventh month, Zhuang Gong went fleeing, Wei people established gong zi Ban Shi as Wei lord.

sentences.zh: 齊伐衛，虜斑師，更立公子起為衛君。

translations.text: Qi attacked Wei, captured Ban Shi, moreover established gong zi Qi as Wei lord.

Third year, Zhuang Gong ascended city, saw Rong Zhou. Said: 'Rong captive why like this?' Rong Zhou ill it. Tenth month, Rong Zhou informed Zhao Jian Zi, Jian Zi surrounded Wei. Eleventh month, Zhuang Gong went fleeing, Wei people established gong zi Ban Shi as Wei lord. Qi attacked Wei, captured Ban Shi, moreover established gong zi Qi as Wei lord.

sentences.zh: 衛君起元年，衛石曼尃逐其君起，起奔齊。

translations.text: Wei lord Qi first year, Wei Shi Man Quan drove their lord Qi, Qi fled Qi.

sentences.zh: 衛出公輒自齊復歸立。

translations.text: Wei Chu Gong Zhe from Qi again returned established.

sentences.zh: 初，出公立十二年亡，亡在外四年復入。

translations.text: Initially, Chu Gong established twelve years fled, fled outside four years re-entered.

sentences.zh: 出公後元年，賞從亡者。

translations.text: Chu Gong after first year, rewarded followed fled people.

sentences.zh: 立二十一年卒，出公季父黔攻出公子而自立，是為悼公。

translations.text: Established twenty-one years died, Chu Gong younger uncle Qian attacked Chu Gong son self established, this was Dao Gong.

Wei lord Qi first year, Wei Shi Man Quan drove their lord Qi, Qi fled Qi. Wei Chu Gong Zhe from Qi again returned established. Initially, Chu Gong established twelve years fled, fled outside four years re-entered. Chu Gong after first year, rewarded followed fled people. Established twenty-one years died, Chu Gong younger uncle Qian attacked Chu Gong son self established, this was Dao Gong.

sentences.zh: 悼公五年卒，子敬公弗立。

translations.text: Dao Gong fifth year died, son Jing Gong Fu established.

sentences.zh: 敬公十九年卒，子昭公糾立。

translations.text: Jing Gong nineteenth year died, son Zhao Gong Jiu established.

sentences.zh: 是時三晉彊，衛如小侯，屬之。

translations.text: At time three Jin strong, Wei like small hou, belonged to them.
Dao Gong fifth year died, son Jing Gong Fu established. Jing Gong nineteenth year died, son Zhao Gong Jiu established. At time three Jin strong, Wei like small hou, belonged to them.

sentences.zh: 昭公六年，公子亹弒之代立，是為懷公。

translations.text: Zhao Gong sixth year, gong zi Wei assassinated him replaced established, this was Huai Gong.

sentences.zh: 懷公十一年，公子穨弒懷公而代立，是為慎公。

translations.text: Huai Gong eleventh year, gong zi Ji assassinated Huai Gong replaced established, this was Shen Gong.

sentences.zh: 慎公父，公子適；

translations.text: Shen Gong father, gong zi Kuo;

sentences.zh: 適父，敬公也。

translations.text: Kuo father, Jing Gong.

sentences.zh: 慎公四十二年卒，子聲公訓立。

translations.text: Shen Gong forty-second year died, son Sheng Gong Xun established.

sentences.zh: 聲公十一年卒，子成侯遫立。

translations.text: Sheng Gong eleventh year died, son Cheng Hou Su established.

Zhao Gong sixth year, gong zi Wei assassinated him replaced established, this was Huai Gong. Huai Gong eleventh year, gong zi Ji assassinated Huai Gong replaced established, this was Shen Gong. Shen Gong father, gong zi Kuo; Kuo father, Jing Gong. Shen Gong forty-second year died, son Sheng Gong Xun established. Sheng Gong eleventh year died, son Cheng Hou Su established.

sentences.zh: 成侯十一年，公孫鞅入秦。

translations.text: Cheng Hou eleventh year, Gong Sun Yang entered Qin.

sentences.zh: 十六年，衛更貶號曰侯。

translations.text: Sixteenth year, Wei moreover reduced title called hou.
Cheng Hou eleventh year, Gong Sun Yang entered Qin. Sixteenth year, Wei moreover reduced title called hou.

sentences.zh: 二十九年，成侯卒，子平侯立。

translations.text: Twenty-ninth year, Cheng Hou died, son Ping Hou established.

sentences.zh: 平侯八年卒，子嗣君立。

translations.text: Ping Hou eighth year died, son Si Jun established.
Twenty-ninth year, Cheng Hou died, son Ping Hou established. Ping Hou eighth year died, son Si Jun established.

sentences.zh: 嗣君五年，更貶號曰君，獨有濮陽。

translations.text: Si Jun fifth year, moreover reduced title called jun, alone had Pu Yang.
Si Jun fifth year, moreover reduced title called jun, alone had Pu Yang.

sentences.zh: 四十二年卒，子懷君立。

translations.text: Forty-second year died, son Huai Jun established.

sentences.zh: 懷君三十一年，朝魏，魏囚殺懷君。

translations.text: Huai Jun thirty-first year, courted Wei, Wei imprisoned killed Huai Jun.

sentences.zh: 魏更立嗣君弟，是為元君。

translations.text: Wei moreover established Si Jun younger brother, this was Yuan Jun.

sentences.zh: 元君為魏婿，故魏立之。

translations.text: Yuan Jun for Wei son-in-law, so Wei established him.

sentences.zh: 元君十四年，秦拔魏東地，秦初置東郡，更徙衛野王縣，而并濮陽為東郡。

translations.text: Yuan Jun fourteenth year, Qin captured Wei eastern land, Qin initially established Dong commandery, moreover moved Wei Ye Wang county, united Pu Yang as Dong commandery.

sentences.zh: 二十五年，元君卒，子君角立。

translations.text: Twenty-fifth year, Yuan Jun died, son Jun Jiao established.

sentences.zh: 君角九年，秦并天下，立為始皇帝。

translations.text: Jun Jiao ninth year, Qin united world, established as Shi Huang Di.

sentences.zh: 二十一年，二世廢君角為庶人，衛絕祀。

translations.text: Twenty-first year, Er Shi abolished Jun Jiao as commoner, Wei cut off sacrifices.

Forty-second year died, son Huai Jun established. Huai Jun thirty-first year, courted Wei, Wei imprisoned killed Huai Jun. Wei moreover established Si Jun younger brother, this was Yuan Jun. Yuan Jun for Wei son-in-law, so Wei established him. Yuan Jun fourteenth year, Qin captured Wei eastern land, Qin initially established Dong commandery, moreover moved Wei Ye Wang county, united Pu Yang as Dong commandery. Twenty-fifth year, Yuan Jun died, son Jun Jiao established. Jun Jiao ninth year, Qin united world, established as Shi Huang Di. Twenty-first year, Er Shi abolished Jun Jiao as commoner, Wei cut off sacrifices.

sentences.zh: 太史公曰：余讀世家言，至於宣公之太子以婦見誅，弟壽爭死以相讓，此與晉太子申生不敢明驪姬之過同，俱惡傷父之志。

translations.text: Grand Historian said: I read genealogy words, to Xuan Gong crown prince with wife seen executed, younger brother Shou contended died mutually yielded, this with Jin crown prince Shen Sheng not dare clear Li Ji excess same, both hated hurt father intention.

sentences.zh: 然卒死亡，何其悲也！

translations.text: But finally died perished, what sad!

sentences.zh: 或父子相殺，兄弟相滅，亦獨何哉？

translations.text: Or father son mutually killed, elder younger brothers mutually extinguished, also alone what?

Grand Historian said: I read genealogy words, to Xuan Gong crown prince with wife seen executed, younger brother Shou contended died mutually yielded, this with Jin crown prince Shen Sheng not dare clear Li Ji excess same, both hated hurt father intention. But finally died perished, what sad! Or father son mutually killed, elder younger brothers mutually extinguished, also alone what?
